mapper.select:
SELECT
a.oymbSeq , a.oymbName , a.oymbNameEng , a.oymbId , a.oymbNickName , a.oymbPassword , a.oymbDelNy , a.oymbGenderCd , a.oymbSkinTypeCd , a.oymbPersonalColorCd , a.oymbSavedCd , a.oymbInterestsCd , a.oymbEmailConsentNy , a.oymbSmsConsentNy , a.oymbPushConsentNy , b.oyjqQuestionCd , b.oyjqAnswer , b.oyjqDelNy , c.oymnSeq , c.oymnDelNy , c.oynaSeq , c.oymbSeq , d.oymaTitle , d.oymaDefaultNy , d.oymaZipCode , d.oymaAddress1 , d.oymaAddress2 , d.oymaAddress3 , d.oymaDelNy , e.oympSeq , e.oympDefaultNy , e.oympTelecomCd , e.oympNumber , e.oympDelNy , f.oymeSeq , f.oymeDefaultNy , f.oymeEmailAccount , f.oymeEmailDomainCd , f.oymeDelNy
FROM oyMember a LEFT JOIN oymbJoinQna b ON b.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbNationality c ON c.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbAddress d ON d.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbPhone e ON e.oympDefaultNy=1 AND e.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbEmail f ON f.oymeDefaultNy=1 AND f.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND a.oymbSeq = #{oymbSeq}

SELECT a.oypdSeq , a.oypdCate , a.oypdBrand , a.oypdName , a.oypdPrice , a.oypdDelNy , b.oyspSeq , b.oyspSalePrice , b.oyspTypeCd , c.originalName , c.uuidName , c.path , c.type , c.delNy
FROM oyProduct a LEFT JOIN oySaleProduct b on b.oypdSeq = a.oypdSeq LEFT JOIN oymbUploaded c on c.type = 0 AND c.pseq = a.oypdSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND oypdDelNy = 0
SELECT oymbSeq , oymbId , oymbPassword , oymbDesc , oymbName FROM oyMember WHERE 1=1 AND oymbId=#{oymbId} AND oymbPassword=#{oymbPassword}
SELECT seq , type , defaultNy , sort , originalName , uuidName , ext , size , delNy , pseq , path FROM oymbUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{oypdSeq} ORDER BY sort
